author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St rises on earnings hopes, easing Syria jitters
text:
NEW YORK, April 12 (Reuters) - U.S. stocks climbed on Thursday as investors anticipated a strong earnings season and as U.S. President Donald Trumpâ€™s suggestion that a military strike on Syria may not be imminent eased geopolitical worries.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 293.29 points, or 1.21 percent, to 24,482.74, the S&P 500 gained 21.82 points, or 0.83 percent, to 2,664.01 and the Nasdaq Composite added 71.22 points, or 1.01 percent, to 7,140.25. (Reporting by April Joyner; editing by Diane Craft)
